title: [Forbidden Hills, Grasslands]
description: Moonlight kisses the heads of the thousands of wildflowers that dot the rolling hills, causing splashes of silvery amongst the shadowy depths of the grass.  Pale luna moths dance around the flowers, fluttering their wings as they stop to rest for a brief second before flying away.

Thousands of wildflowers dot the rolling hills, causing splashes of color amongst the vibrant green of the grass.  A few colorful butterflies dance around the flowers, fluttering their wings as they stop to rest for a brief second before flying away.
